com.lukflug.panelstudio.widget

Class ScrollBar<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ComponentBase
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.FocusableComponent
        • com.lukflug.panelstudio.widget.ScrollBar<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the state type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent

    public abstract class ScrollBar<T>
extends FocusableComponent
    Scroll bar for use in scrollable containers.

                         int button)
        Description copied from interface: IComponent

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • handleScroll

        public void handleScroll(Context context,
                         int diff)
        Description copied from interface: IComponent
        Should be called by the parent when the mouse wheel is scrolled. The current height of the component should be set by this method via Context.setHeight(int).
        Specified by:
        handleScroll in interface IComponent
        Overrides:
        handleScroll in class ComponentBase
        Parameters:
        context - the Context for the component
        diff - the amount by which the wheel was moved
